name: faggot
content:
faggot noun
(GAY MAN)
[ C ] mainly US offensive (offensive fag) an extremely offensive word for a gay man
faggot noun
(WOOD)
[ C usually plural ] old-fashioned (US also fagot) sticks of wood, tied together and used as fuel for a fire
Polaris17/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

faggot noun
(FOOD)
[ C usually plural ] UK a ball of meat mixed with bread and herbs, fried or cooked in sauce
JoeGough/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
